issue.title: [Gandiva][C++] Fix castINTERVALYEAR implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16881](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16881). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fix error in LLVM where didn't find this function.

Fix regex to allow negative digits for Interval Year.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16881?focusedCommentId=17569378) by Johnnathan Rodrigo Pego de Almeida (johnnathanalmeida):*
The error with castINTERVALYEAR was fixed in Gandiva side. The fix will be available in 23 Arrow version.
